raw_comment:
1. What do you notice? If your notice makes a claim, where in the graph is the evidence to support it?
I noticed that in all three categories, young women reach out more than young men.
2. What do you wonder?
Why is it that visits in person are in the least common form and why do young women usually reach out more?
3. What impact does this have on you and your community?
This impacts all of the kids in my high school, and when I reach out to my parents
4. What's going on in this graph? Write a catchy headline that captures the graph's main idea.
How much do teenagers reach out to there parents for help?
ace_sentences: In all three categories, young women reach out more than young men.
I wonder why in-person visits are the least common form.
I wonder why young women usually reach out more than young men.
This impacts all kids in my high school.
This impacts me when I reach out to my parents.
The headline is: How much do teenagers reach out to their parents for help?
